install.name: RokTabs
install.author: RocketTheme, LLC
install.description: RokTabs is a news module designed to show section articles in a pleasing format. Brought to you by RocketTheme

param.name: style
param.label: Theme Style
param.description: The style theme you want to use. Custom will disable the default styles and will let you use your own customized style. It will be added 'base' classname.

param.name: content_type
param.label: Content Type
param.description: whether to use Joomla Core Content, or K2 Content

param.name: show_front
param.label: Joomla Frontpage Items
param.description: Show frontpage articles in this module

param.name: category_id
param.label: K2 Filter items by category
param.description: Select one ore more categories for which you want to filter an items list. Select none to fetch items from all categories.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Width in pixel to be used for RokTabs

param.name: tabs_count
param.label: Max # of Tabs (0 = All)
param.description: The maximum number of tabs to show. Use 0 to show them all.

param.name: duration
param.label: Transition Duration
param.description: Duration in ms of the transition effect

param.name: transition_type
param.label: Type of Transition
param.description: The type of the transition. Can be scrolling or fading.

param.name: transition_fx
param.label: Transition Effect
param.description: The effect to be used for the transition

param.name: linksMargins
param.label: Subtract roktabs-links margins
param.description: Whether to subtract roktabs-links margins from the tabs width

param.name: tabs_position
param.label: Tabs Position
param.description: Where make the tabs to appear

param.name: tabs_event
param.label: Tabs Interaction
param.description: If you want to mouseover or click for triggering the tab change

param.name: tabs_title
param.label: Tabs Title
param.description:
Choose one of the way you want your Tabs title are set.
By Content Title: uses the Title assigned when creating the content.
By First Content h6 tag: searches for the first h6 tag in your content and use its value as Tab Title (you can hide or show h6 in the content from the option below).
By Incremental: set the Tabs title by the 'Incremental prepend text' option below and then append incremental values (i.e. Tab 1 | Tab 2 | Tab 3).

param.name: tabs_incremental
param.label: Incremental prepend text
param.description: The prepend text to be used when Incremental Tabs Title is set

param.name: tabs_hideh6
param.label: Hide h6 tags?
param.description: Whether to hide or not h6 tags when used as Tabs Titles

param.name: tabs_showicons
param.label: Show Tab Icons
param.description: Choose whether or not to show tab icons

param.name: tabs_iconside
param.label: Tab Icon Side
param.description: Choose whether the tab icons should show on the right or the left of the tab title

param.name: tabs_iconpath
param.label: Tab Icons Path
param.description: The location of your tab icons, use __template__ for current template directory, and __module__ for current module directory

param.name: autoplay
param.label: Autoplay
param.description: Whether to autoplay RokTabs or no

params.name: autoplay_delay
params.label: Autoplay Delay (ms)
params.description: Amount in milliseconds for the autoplay to change. Default 2secs (2000ms)

param.name: module_cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
